column2: Advansix, Inc. engages in the development and production of nylon resin products and other additives. The company is headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey and currently employs 1,485 full-time employees. The firm also sells a variety of other products, all of which are produced as part of the Nylon 6 resin manufacturing process primarily, including caprolactam, ammonium sulfate fertilizers and other chemical intermediates. The firm operates primarily through its integrated manufacturing sites located in Frankford, Pennsylvania, Hopewell, Virginia, and Chesterfield, Virginia. The firm offers ammonium sulfate, which is used by customers as a nitrogen-based fertilizer. The company produces ammonium sulfate fertilizer as part of its manufacturing process. The firm manufactures ammonium sulfate fertilizers including Sulf-N and Sulf-N 26. The firm provides AdvanSix Aegis nylon resins and Aegis barrier nylon resins. Its nylon resins are a preferred choice in food, liquid, and consumer packaging along with mono/multifilament products, carpet fibers, automotive compounding and more. The company offers Capran biaxially oriented nylon films.
